original_text: Then the king of Assyria heard a report about Tirhakah, the king of Ethiopia. People told him, ‘He has brought his army from Ethiopia to fight against you.’
korean_text: 앗수르 왕은 구스 왕 디르하가가 당신과 싸우고자 나왔다 함을 듣고 다시 히스기야에게 사자를 보내며 이르되

sentences.original_text: Then the king of Assyria heard a report
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 앗수르 왕이 한 소식을 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: about Tirhakah, the king of Ethiopia
'He has brought his army from Ethiopia
